welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Kirkwood, a city known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our vibrant community has to offer during your visit."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves mainly low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Alton Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
